mapper.insert: insert into guestbook values(null, #{name}, password(#{password}), #{content}, current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select no, name, message, meg_date from guestbook order by meg_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no = #{no} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: select password from guestbook where password = password(#{password}) and no = #{no}
